languages.text: "Вот скажи, ты действительно считаешь, что несвязное бормотание калеки, спасенного из друкарского плена, хоть кого-то тут убедит? Они же его там так мучили, так пытали, вот бедняга и рехнулся — везде предателей видит. Вигастис не дурак — знает, что я выкручусь. Теперь и ты это знаешь! Разве не прелестно?" {n}Комиссар ухмыляется и подмигивает Вигастису, который в ответ лишь продолжает сверлить его взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вот скажи, ты действительно считаешь, что несвязное бормотание калеки, спасенного из друкарского плена, хоть кого-то тут убедит? Они же его там так мучили, так пытали, вот бедняга и рехнулся — везде предателей видит. Вигастис не дурак — знает, что я выкручусь. Теперь и ты это знаешь! Разве не прелестно?" {n}Комиссар ухмыляется и подмигивает Вигастису, который в ответ лишь продолжает сверлить его взглядом.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вот скажи, ты действительно считаешь, что несвязное бормотание калеки, спасенного из друкарского плена, хоть кого-то тут убедит? Они же его там так мучили, так пытали, вот бедняга и рехнулся — везде предателей видит. Вигастис не дурак — знает, что я выкручусь. Теперь и ты это знаешь! Разве не прелестно?" {n}Комиссар ухмыляется и подмигивает Вигастису, который в ответ лишь продолжает сверлить его взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him silently.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}

languages.text: “说真的，他不过是个残废的家伙，刚刚被人从黑暗灵族的囚笼里解救出来。你真的以为，那些人会相信他语无伦次的哭诉吗？噢！那些怪物一直在折磨这个可怜的小伙子，他受了太多的苦！难怪他被折磨得精神错乱了，看谁都像叛徒！维加斯特可不是蠢货。他很清楚，到最后人们会相信我，而如今你也意识到了这一点！这真的挺不错，是吧？”{n}政委咧嘴笑着，朝维加斯特眨了眨眼，维加斯特只是死死地瞪着他。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “说真的，他不过是个残废的家伙，刚刚被人从黑暗灵族的囚笼里解救出来。你真的以为，那些人会相信他语无伦次的哭诉吗？噢！那些怪物一直在折磨这个可怜的小伙子，他受了太多的苦！难怪他被折磨得精神错乱了，看谁都像叛徒！维加斯特可不是蠢货。他很清楚，到最后人们会相信我，而如今你也意识到了这一点！这真的挺不错，是吧？”{n}政委咧嘴笑着，朝维加斯特眨了眨眼，维加斯特只是死死地瞪着他。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「デュカーリの投獄から救出されたばかりの支離滅裂なことしか言わない廃人の言うことを信じる者がいるとでも？この若者はあの怪物どもに拷問された！そんなことがあれば誰でも正気を失い、被害妄想に陥るでしょう！ヴィガステスは馬鹿じゃない。常に私が一枚上手だと知っている。あなたもそう思うでしょう？」{n} コミッサーはにやりと笑ってヴィガステスにウィンクをしたが、彼は依然としてコミッサーを睨み続けている。 {/n}
languages.original_text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリの投獄から救出されたばかりの支離滅裂なことしか言わない廃人の言うことを信じる者がいるとでも？この若者はあの怪物どもに拷問された！そんなことがあれば誰でも正気を失い、被害妄想に陥るでしょう！ヴィガステスは馬鹿じゃない。常に私が一枚上手だと知っている。あなたもそう思うでしょう？」{n} コミッサーはにやりと笑ってヴィガステスにウィンクをしたが、彼は依然としてコミッサーを睨み続けている。 {/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Dígame, ¿de verdad cree que el incoherente balbuceo de un tullido que acaba de rescatar de manos de los Drukhari convencerá a alguien? Esos monstruos han torturado al pobre muchacho, ¡ha vivido un calvario! ¡Normal que haya perdido la cordura y que vea a traidores por todas partes! Vigastes no es imbécil; sabe que yo siempre me salgo con la mía. ¡Y ahora usted también? ¿A que es genial?». {n}El Comisario sonríe y le guiña el ojo a Vigastes, que se limita a seguir fulminándolo con la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Dígame, ¿de verdad cree que el incoherente balbuceo de un tullido que acaba de rescatar de manos de los Drukhari convencerá a alguien? Esos monstruos han torturado al pobre muchacho, ¡ha vivido un calvario! ¡Normal que haya perdido la cordura y que vea a traidores por todas partes! Vigastes no es imbécil; sabe que yo siempre me salgo con la mía. ¡Y ahora usted también? ¿A que es genial?». {n}El Comisario sonríe y le guiña el ojo a Vigastes, que se limita a seguir fulminándolo con la mirada.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous croyez vraiment que les jérémiades incohérentes d'un estropié tout juste sauvé des mains des Drukharis auront la moindre chance de convaincre qui que ce soit ici ? Ce pauvre homme a été torturé sans discontinuer ! Il a tellement souffert ! Pas étonnant qu'il n'ait plus toute sa tête et qu'il voie des traîtres partout ! Vigastes n'est pas bête, il sait qu'il ne peut rien contre moi. Et maintenant, vous aussi ! N'est-ce pas merveilleux ? » {n}Le commissaire, toujours avec un grand sourire, adresse un clin d'œil à Vigastes qui se contente de le foudroyer du regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous croyez vraiment que les jérémiades incohérentes d'un estropié tout juste sauvé des mains des Drukharis auront la moindre chance de convaincre qui que ce soit ici ? Ce pauvre homme a été torturé sans discontinuer ! Il a tellement souffert ! Pas étonnant qu'il n'ait plus toute sa tête et qu'il voie des traîtres partout ! Vigastes n'est pas bête, il sait qu'il ne peut rien contre moi. Et maintenant, vous aussi ! N'est-ce pas merveilleux ? » {n}Le commissaire, toujours avec un grand sourire, adresse un clin d'œil à Vigastes qui se contente de le foudroyer du regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Seid Ihr wirklich der Ansicht, das zusammenhanglose Gefasel eines Krüppels, der gerade aus Drukhari-Gefangenschaft befreit wurde, könnte irgendjemanden hier überzeugen? Diese Monster haben den armen Kerl gefoltert, er hat viel durchgemacht! Kein Wunder, dass er den Verstand verloren hat und überall Verräter sieht! Vigastes ist nicht dumm, er weiß, dass ich immer die Oberhand behalte. Und jetzt wisst Ihr es auch! Ist das nicht toll?" {n}Der Kommissar grinst und winkt Vigastes zu, der ihn lediglich weiterhin anstarrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr wirklich der Ansicht, das zusammenhanglose Gefasel eines Krüppels, der gerade aus Drukhari-Gefangenschaft befreit wurde, könnte irgendjemanden hier überzeugen? Diese Monster haben den armen Kerl gefoltert, er hat viel durchgemacht! Kein Wunder, dass er den Verstand verloren hat und überall Verräter sieht! Vigastes ist nicht dumm, er weiß, dass ich immer die Oberhand behalte. Und jetzt wisst Ihr es auch! Ist das nicht toll?" {n}Der Kommissar grinst und winkt Vigastes zu, der ihn lediglich weiterhin anstarrt.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Söylesene... Buradaki insanlar; Drukhari hücrelerinden yeni kurtulmuş, bir dediği bir dediğini tutmayan bir sakatın laflarıyla bir şeye ikna olur mu sence? O yaratıklar, bu zavallıcığa işkence etmiş! Neler neler yaşamış! Keçileri kaçırmış olmasına, nereye baksa hain görüyor olmasına şaşmamalı! Vigastes aptal değildir, her zaman yolumu bulacağımı bilir. Artık sen de biliyorsun! Harika değil mi?" {n}Komiser, sırıtıp Vigastes'e göz kırpıyor. Vigastes ise karşılık olarak yalnızca dik dik bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Tell me, do you honestly think that the incoherent blubbering of a cripple who just got rescued from Drukhari imprisonment will convince anyone in here? Those monsters tortured the poor lad, he's been through so much! No wonder he's lost his marbles and sees traitors everywhere! Vigastes is no fool, he knows I always come out on top. Now you know it too! Isn't that great?" {n}The Commissar grins and winks at Vigastes, who merely continues to glare at him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Söylesene, Drukhari hücrelerinden yeni kurtulmuş, bir dediği bir dediğini tutmayan bir sakatın lafları burada kimseyi ikna edebilir mi sence gerçekten? O yaratıklar zavallıcığa işkence etmişler! Neler neler yaşamış! Keçileri kaçırmış olmasına, nereye baksa hain görüyor olmasına şaşmamalı! Vigastes aptal değildir, her zaman yolumu bulacağımı bilir. Artık sen de biliyorsun! Sence de harika değil mi?" {n}Komiser sırıtıp Vigastes'e göz kırpıyor, o ise karşılık olarak yalnızca dik dik bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
